cast.name: 迈克·德·卢卡 Mike De Luca

this_title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter David Goyer
introduction: David Goyer knows how to bring comic book heroes to kicking, screaming, vengeful life, as he did in The Crow: City of Angels, the Blade series, and Batman Begins. In this wry and surprising dialogue, he reveals his tricks of the trade, how to hook an actor's ego, and why fear can pay the bills.
chinese_title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter David Goyer
